article_title: Car dealership owner in dispute with utility company

article_metadata.author: Doug Ireland direland@eagletribune.com

og.description: SALEM, N.H. — When Emmett Horgan decided to expand his car dealership on Route 28, he didn't anticipate having to pay for the right to pave his own property.
